title: [GAMEPLAY] Vi R bug.

embed.description: Watch Kronksterpher's League of Legends video: Vi R bug @vi costed me the game - Plays.tv

body:
When ulting as vi she slowly walks up to the target unable to auto attack or press Q. She is stuck in this state for a short while. Smite could be casted during the bug, similar to her regular ult. 
I have no idea what caused the bug so i instead brought a video to show how it happened. 
I have never had this bug happen to be before.

replies.body: it looked to me like you got bugged because poppy ult was meant to hit you too. but since your ult is unstoppable you just slowed down
I just noticed that, either way, that interaction seems very weird.
It might be because you have 20 fps, which is very low. Your pc might not be able to handle everything thats going on in a team fight and results in some weird lag.
The game runs at a solid ~80 fps on my pc. My plays.tv had some improperly set settings resulting in this. The video had the lag not my game.
